comment: Bought a 2015 Ford Focus from Connolly Motors, Dublin 3. Delighted with the car and with the service. Highly recommend.
Looking for a five-door car. Budget of €15,000. Preferably low mileage. Kildare area.
Just had a service done on my Honda Civic by Murphy Motors, Glasnevin. Fantastic service and very reasonable cost.
Bought a 2016 Ford Fiesta. Never again. My granny has more horse power.
Looking for a reputable garage in the Westmeath area. Any suggestions?
Thinking of buying an electric car. Budget of €40k. Best options?
I'm looking for a Nissan Qashquai+2. Low mileage. Around €17k
Need advice! Which is better - a Nissan Qashqai or a Ford Galaxy? Thanks.
